publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3667 Pauline McNeill: Cancer, Stroke and Heart Disease Research at University of Glasgow-That the Parliament welcomes the £1 million awarded to the University of Glasgow to carry out research into cancer, stroke and heart disease.

S1M-3667 Pauline McNeill: Cancer, Stroke and Heart Disease Research at University of Glasgow-That the Parliament welcomes the £1 million awarded to the University of Glasgow to carry out research into cancer, stroke and heart disease.
S1M-3667 Cancer, Stroke and Heart Disease Research at University of Glasgow (lodged on 2 December 2002) Brian Fitzpatrick*
S1M-3667 Cancer, Stroke and Heart Disease Research at University of Glasgow (lodged on 2 December 2002) Irene Oldfather*
S1M-3667 Cancer, Stroke and Heart Disease Research at University of Glasgow (lodged on 2 December 2002) Tommy Sheridan*
S1M-3667 Cancer, Stroke and Heart Disease Research at University of Glasgow (lodged on 2 December 2002) Margaret Jamieson*
S1M-3667 Cancer, Stroke and Heart Disease Research at University of Glasgow (lodged on 2 December 2002) Bill Butler*

S1M-3667 Pauline McNeill: Cancer, Stroke and Heart Disease Research at University of Glasgow—That the Parliament welcomes the £1 million awarded to the University of Glasgow to carry out research into cancer, stroke and heart disease. Supported by: Brian Fitzpatrick, Irene Oldfather, Tommy Sheridan, Margaret Jamieson, Bill Butler
